properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:50AM EST until January 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington OH
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers...

Great Miami River at Sidney

The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Great Miami River at Sidney
* from this afternoon through Sunday evening.
* At 9 AM the stage was 6.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 10 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Rainfall today will cause the river to rise above flood stage late
this afternoon and reach 11.2 feet after midnight tonight. The
river is expected to below flood stage Sunday afternoon.
* At stages near 11 feet, Custenborder Field has some perimeter
flooding, and flooding occurrs in low spots on Miami River Road.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Do not drive your car through flooded roadways. The
water depth may be deeper than it appears.


Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather All Hazards
radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
